alert.note: Alert for Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued March 14 at 1:35AM EDT until March 14 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM EDT Tuesday through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NEW HAVEN HARBOR AT NEW HAVEN CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 8.7 FT, MODERATE 9.3 FT, MAJOR 10.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 2.6 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/05 PM 7.1/ 7.6 0.4/ 0.9 1.8/ 2.2 1 NONE 14/05 AM 9.1/ 9.6 2.3/ 2.8 2.8/ 3.4 2 MODERATE 14/05 PM 6.8/ 7.3 0.1/ 0.6 1.5/ 2.0 1-2 NONE 15/06 AM 7.2/ 7.7 0.5/ 1.0 1.1/ 1.6 2 NONE 15/06 PM 6.8/ 7.3 0.1/ 0.6 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE 16/07 AM 7.8/ 8.4 1.2/ 1.7 1.7/ 2.2 1 NONE THAMES RIVER AT NEW LONDON CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.1 FT, MODERATE 6.1 FT, MAJOR 7.9 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/03 AM 4.9/ 5.4 1.8/ 2.2 2.2/ 2.7 2-3 MINOR 14/03 PM 3.5/ 4.0 0.4/ 0.9 1.6/ 2.0 2 NONE 15/04 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.6/ 1.1 1.1/ 1.6 3 NONE 15/05 PM 3.2/ 3.7 0.1/ 0.6 1.3/ 1.8 3 NONE 16/05 AM 4.0/ 4.5 1.0/ 1.5 1.4/ 1.9 2 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
